author: AFRICA-NEWS
title: U.S., States Step Up Pressure on Facebook
text:
/ ivory coast U.S., States Step Up Pressure on Facebook 
U.S. government officials ratcheted up pressure on Facebook Inc. on Monday over its handling of user data, with federal regulators saying they are investigating the social-media giant’s privacy practices and 37 state attorneys general demanding explanations of its practices. 
The Federal Trade Commission, in a statement, signaled that its probe of Facebook is broad. Tom Pahl, a top FTC official, described it as “an open nonpublic investigation” and said the commission “takes very seriously” recent reports raising “substantial… ADVERTISEMENT
